required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Dietary Ingredients on Vascular Function
clinical_study.official_title: Investigating the Effects of Dietary Ingredients on Vascular Function During Acute Glucose Load

brief_summary.textblock:
The main aim of the study is to investigate the effects of dietary ingredients (polyphenols and carotenoids) on vascular function during acute glucose load. Each subject will receive 4 weeks of intervention with test product or placebo product after a dietary restriction run-in period of 14 days. Subjects will be challenged with an oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT) immediately after the run-in phase and at the end of the intervention phase. During the OGTT, blood samples will be taken at regular intervals.
The study will be conducted in subjects with impaired glucose tolerance.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline (after 2 weeks run-in period) and after 4 weeks intervention

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline (after 2 weeks run-in period) and after 4 weeks intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Luminex HS cytokine, CVD, ADK and MMP panel Endothelial derived factors Systemic inflammatory cytokines: hsTNFα Systemic inflammatory cytokines: hsCRP Endothelial cell function markers Oxidative stress parameters

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline (after 2 weeks run-in period) and after 4 weeks intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Direct & indirect markers of cell defence activation Inflammatory and oxidative stress markers Established and exploratory cardiovascular health markers

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline (after run-in period of 2 weeks) and after 4 weeks intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Glucose & Insulin Total cholesterol, LDL, HDL, triglycerides, uric acid, Glycated Serum Proteins & HbA1C.

intervention.intervention_name: A capsule containing both polyphenols and carotenoids
